FuncDef: Configures a destination MAC address or range to be used as a MAC filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MAC address to be used as a match criterion. Values-HH:HH:HH:HH:HH:HH or HH-HH-HH-HH-HH-HH where H is a hexadecimal digit. Note that both upper and lower case are supported..
Specifies a 48-bit mask to match a range of MAC address values. Values-HH:HH:HH:HH:HH:HH or HH-HH-HH-HH-HH-HH. ParamDefault: Default- ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff (exact match)
